description: Complete system overview documenting the psychic reading platform architecture, key components, and high-level interactions between services
Detailed documentation of the reading session lifecycle, including real-time billing, state transitions, scheduling logic, and automated notifications
Comprehensive documentation of core data models (User, ReadingSession, Schedule, Review) and their relationships, with focus on reader profiles and session management
Documentation of the per-minute billing implementation, payment processing, revenue sharing calculations, and automated payout workflows
Documentation of reader discovery system, availability management, scheduling algorithms, and rating/review mechanisms
